Article.Title: Watch The Videos From Google’s Zeitgeist Event Featuring Eric Schmidt And CEO Larry Page
Article.Content: Google’s TOP SEKRET Google Zeitgeist event for partners took place this week in Arizona. The company has released a series of videos from the event, featuring such speakers as former CEO Eric Schmidt and current Google CEO Larry Page. Topics consisted of “The World” and exploration, Google’s strong areas. Needless to say, we weren’t there. Maybe we’ll get invited next time ;) Here are a few of the more interesting talks, but definitely go check all of them out. Eric Schmidt: The World Around Us Larry Page Q&A Sir Ken Robinson Andrew Ross Sorkin: The World We Design [Photo credit: Loic]
